identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a visceral, stadium-like football marketplace. Reject generic e-commerce templates. Design for the fan's pulse.
core_principles: The Tunnel Effect: Users enter from darkness into light (Hero -> Content).
Pitch Perfect: Green is sacred. Use it only for 'Success' and 'Pitch' elements.
Floodlight Focus: High contrast white text on dark backgrounds. No grey soup.
Tactile Tickets: Digital tickets should look like collectibles (holographic foils, textures).

grid_system.bento_hero: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 h-auto md:h-[600px]

Button.default: bg-white text-black hover:bg-slate-200 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-sm h-12 px-8 transition-transform active:scale-95
Button.outline: border border-white/20 hover:border-white text-white bg-transparent font-bold uppercase tracking-wide rounded-sm h-12 px-8
Button.ghost: text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 uppercase font-medium tracking-wide

Card.base: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-white/20 transition-colors duration-300
Card.interactive: group cursor-pointer relative hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300

Input.base: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 text-white placeholder:text-slate-600 focus:border-white/50 focus:ring-0 rounded-lg h-12

SeatMap.style: The map must look technical and architectural. Dark mode map. Seats are dots. VIP areas are gold polygons.

universal_guidelines: NEVER use gradients on text. It reduces readability in high-glare environments (like outdoors).
ALWAYS use high-contrast images. If an image is too bright, apply a 40% black overlay.
Data density is good for the 'Match List', but 'Hero' sections must be minimal.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all numbers (prices, dates, scores). It looks like a scoreboard.
Arabic RTL support is mandatory. Ensure 'dir=rtl' is set on the root when language is AR.
Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use real team names and stadium names in mock data.
